abstract: J.C. Penney is scheduled to begin an advertising effort on Feb. 1 to spread the word about major changes coming to Penney under its new chief executive, Ron Johnson, formerly of Apple, and its new president, Michael Francis, formerly of Target.
snippet: J.C. Penney is scheduled to begin an advertising effort on Feb. 1 to spread the word about major changes coming to Penney under its new chief executive, Ron Johnson, formerly of Apple, and its new president, Michael Francis, formerly of Target.
lead_paragraph: Shoppers are about to find out what is changing at J.C. Penney in an advertising effort that, not coincidentally, evokes the Target way of marketing.

headline.main: Penney’s New Approach Takes Target-Like Tack
